byline.contributor: Jawad Sukhanyar, Ahmad Shakib and Fazal Muzhary contributed reporting.

abstract: Taliban fighters overtake Yamgan District in northeastern Afghanistan, area where government's influence has flagged.
lead_paragraph: Taliban fighters overwhelmed security forces in the Yamgan district of Badakhshan Province, where the government’s influence has waned considerably over the past two years.

headline.main: Taliban Overrun Remote District in Northeastern Afghanistan
headline.print_headline: Taliban Overrun Remote District in Northeast Afghanistan

snippet: Taliban fighters overwhelmed security forces in the Yamgan district of Badakhshan Province, where the government’s influence has waned considerably over the past two years.
